title: BRIEF-Corline Biomedical: Results Of First Study Of Drug Candidate Renaparin
author: Reuters Staff
description: * DRUG CANDIDATE RENAPARIN SHOWS GOOD SAFETY PROFILE IN FIRST STUDY ON PATIENTS
cleaned_text: June 10 (Reuters) - Corline Biomedical AB: * DRUG CANDIDATE RENAPARIN SHOWS FIRST STUDY ON PATIENTS * RENAPARIN HAS GOOD RESULTS FOR BOTH PRIMARY AND SECONDARY PHASE 1 ENDPOINTS * NEXT STEP IN DEVELOPMENT OF RENAPARIN EXPECTED TO BE COMMUNICATED IN SEPTEMBER 2020 Source Further company
